text: The Madhya Pradesh government has asserted that the recent order of the Intellectual Property Appellate Board, directing the Geographical Indications Registry to proceed with registration of a Geographical Indication (GI) tag for Basmati rice, according to the geographical demarcation conducted by the Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority, is unscientific and erroneous. It has approached the Madras High Court to quash the order and direct the registry to hear the matter afresh.
title: M.P. appeals against IPAB order on Basmati
